job_tasks.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of converting business requirements into functional software.

job_tasks.phrase: Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the technical environment and architecture for software development, including deployment and structure.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the design and evolution of software systems and products.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work together with allying platforms, peers, and colleagues in the consumer domain.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration within a software development context, working with other systems and teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
job_tasks.justification: This describes participation in a broader engineering community focused on sharing knowledge and improving practices, typical of software development environments.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: This positions the role as a full-stack developer contributing to AI initiatives, implying integration of AI into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes leadership in developing solutions and collaboration, which are core software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: "Door de juiste integratie oplossingen te ontwikkelen zorg jij ervoor dat het applicatie- en IT landschap van PostNL keten breed op elkaar aansluit."
job_tasks.justification: This Dutch phrase directly translates to developing integration solutions to connect the application and IT landscape, a clear software integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work together with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and help each other move forward.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights teamwork and mutual support.

soft_skills.justification: This indicates collaborative thinking and decision-making within a team.

soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes working with various stakeholders and teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
soft_skills.justification: This points to active participation and knowledge sharing within a professional community.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights collaboration with experts and promoting technology within communities.

soft_skills.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions
soft_skills.justification: This indicates taking initiative and leadership in creating new solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.
soft_skills.justification: This shows an understanding of the platform's importance and its role in supporting other business units.

soft_skills.phrase: Your knowledge, insights and commitment as a Senior Software Engineer are crucial to achieving our goals.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the importance of the role's contribution to the company's overall objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.
soft_skills.justification: This directly links technical work to understanding and solving business process challenges.

soft_skills.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
soft_skills.justification: This implies strategic thinking about product direction and technological choices.

soft_skills.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
soft_skills.justification: This shows the role's contribution to broader company initiatives in AI.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software engineering tasks (translating business processes into applications, microservices architecture, CI/CD, AWS Serverless) and explicitly mentions Python as the core language. While it mentions 'data science and generative AI' and the desire to 'make great strides' in these areas, the core responsibilities described are those of a Senior Software Developer. The AI/GenAI aspect appears to be an area of future development or integration rather than the primary focus of the role's day-to-day tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it involves building software that will likely incorporate AI/ML features, but the core of the work remains software development.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the core software engineering responsibilities and technologies. However, the mention of 'generative AI' is somewhat aspirational and not detailed with specific tasks or tools related to GenAI, making it slightly less definitive than a role explicitly detailing LLM development or RAG implementation. The primary focus remains on traditional software development.
